doombox.title: Doombox
doombox.description: Doombox is an Electron-based music player designed and built to support a large, personal music collection.

techlab.title: Companion AI & You
techlab.description: Companion AI & You is an experimental project I've done during Tech Lab. The goal of the project was to invoke the question 'Is it possible to have a relationship with an AI?'

thesis.title: Meaningful Interaction in Narrative-driven Games
thesis.description: The way stories are told within narrative-driven games is inherently flawed. Games, as a medium, are unique in the sense that they are interactive. We believe that games must capitalize on this unique ability when conveying stories.
